title: Typing Speed Test
description: Type the prompt and check your WPM and accuracy in real time.
helper: The timer starts automatically when you type the first character.

result.format: Typing result - WPM {{wpm}}, Accuracy {{accuracy}}%, Time {{time}}, Correct/Total {{correct}}/{{total}}

samples: Focus on accuracy first, speed will follow naturally.
Small habits grow into meaningful changes over time.
Take a deep breath and keep your rhythm steady.
A short break can help you stay sharp and relaxed.
Finish the sentence to see your final stats.

openGraph.title: Typing Speed Test
openGraph.description: Practice with a sample sentence and instantly see WPM and accuracy.
